page.title: 03Homes 1 Shobdon and Byton
page.content: In our survey on{Homes}we found that; 45 people lived in{houses 24 people lived in{bungalows 8 people lived in{cottages and 1 person lived in a{flat.} This we think gives a true picture of the area. Only{13}out of the{78}we asked had lived in the area{all their lives. { { }We asked the 65 incomers why they came to live in the area. 7 married local people 15 already had relatives here 28 found a job in the area and 15 liked the place. We also asked all 78 people if they{ {liked living in Shobdon / Byton 76 people liked the area 1 said," No comment!" and 1 said," No!."
